    R

    readInt(String) - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.user.Admin
    Reads an integer input from the user
    run() - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.ui.CLI
    Method to initiate the payroll system Allows user to select from 3 roles (admin/HR/Employee) to login as Runs the relevant cli method based on which one is chosen For both admin and hr, the authentication method is run first to ensure the user is an admin or hr staff If correct, their respective cli environment is run If incorrect 3 times, they are logged out.
